tool.name: OGR Informations
tool.command:
ogrinfo -ro '$input1.extra_files_path/Shapefile.shp' -al #if $settings.advanced=='advanced'
#unless $settings.sql=='eg : SELECT * FROM Shapefile WHERE X>10': -sql '$settings.sql' #end unless
$settings.so
#end if
> '$output'

param.name: sql
param.label: Sql query
param.value: eg : SELECT * FROM Shapefile WHERE X>10
param.help: Execute the indicated SQL statement and return the result. Your input is renamed Shapefile.

param.name: so
param.label: Summary only
param.help: Summary Only: suppress listing of features, show only the summary information like projection, schema, feature count and extents.

tool.help:
The Oogrinfo program lists various information about a GDAL supported vector dataset.
http://www.gdal.org
http://www.gdal.org/ogr_utilities.html
http://download.osgeo.org/gdal/workshop/foss4ge2015/workshop_gdal.pdf
